thread.title: james
thread.title_full: Gift Card Granny reviewed by james

author: james
title: james
text: Giftcardgranny.com is where I go to begin my search for savings. After several years of using the website, I am happy with its layout and links to individual gift card resellers. Customer service is prompt. Content is usually current. The consolidation of other sites is a time saver. Thanks.
